text: Gurbir Singh Grewal (; born June 23, 1973) is an American lawyer and politician. He has been the Director of the Division of Enforcement for the Securities and Exchange Commission since 2021. He was the Attorney General of New Jersey from January 2018 until July 2021. Grewal was the county prosecutor of Bergen County, New Jersey from 2016 to 2018. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:New Jersey attorneys general Category:Politicians from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gurbir Grewal
